records.QueryText: Asked about sucking pest control in brinjal
records.KccAns: Collect and destroy mined leaves. Recommended to spray Acephate 75 SP. 1 gm per liter of  water or Acetamiprid 20% SP 0.3 gm per liter of water and Spray NSKE 5%.

records.QueryText: Information regarding growth regulator used in wheat crop at time of heading stage?
records.KccAns: For control of Aphid in wheat, spray 40ml Confidor 17.8SL(imidacloprid)  or 20g Actara 25WG(thiamethoxam) or 12g Dantop 50WDG(clothianidin) or 150ml Rogor 30EC(dimethoate) in 80-100 litres of water per acre.
Some clouds and chance of rain fall today.

records.QueryText: asking about Tapioca top dressing fertilizer management
records.KccAns: Recommended for apply urea 40kg + potash 80kg / acre

records.QueryText: Control of flower dropping in Mango
records.KccAns: Dear farmer spray of Propaquizafop 10% EC , 250 ml/acre with 200 liter of water

records.QueryText: ASKING ABOUT PRADHANMANTRI RABBI CROP INSURANCE SCHEME ?
records.KccAns: For more information of agricultural insurance scheme , contact near natinalised bank or contact on 1800  266 0700 /1800-103-0061 / 1800 103 5499 these Toll Free numbers.

records.QueryText: Control of disease in fruit plant ?
records.KccAns:
Control of disease in fruit plant ?
Spray 2 gm M-45 or Bavastin or Copper Oxy Chloride or Sulfex or Ridomil Gold or Captan / liter water .

records.QueryText: Information regarding control of Aphid in wheat ?
records.KccAns: For control of Aphid in wheat, spray 40ml Confidor 17.8SL(imidacloprid) or 20g Actara 25WG(thiamethoxam) or 12g Dantop 50WDG(clothianidin) or 150ml Rogor 30EC(dimethoate) in 80-100 litres of water per acre.

records.QueryText: TELL ME DISEASE CONTROL IN CUMIN ?
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF RIDOMIL MZ(METALEXYL+MENCOZEB) 2 GM PER LITER WATER FOR CONTROL OF WHITE RUST DISEASE IN CUMIN

records.QueryText: ASKING ABOUT PRADHANMANTRI RABBI CROP INSURANCE SCHEME -N PAITHAN -BLOCK, AURANGAB REGION ?
records.KccAns: BLOCK - PAITHAN , AURANGABAD REGION  - CONTACT NUMBER FOR PRADHANMANTRI CROP INSURANCE SCHEME -CALL  020  64278900  ON THIS NUMBER

In the district of your metropolis, from March 2 to March 4, the weather will be variable and wind and thunderstorms will be possible with some drizzling or light rains likely and later the weather is likely.
